display_name: Respiratory Event Index (Non-Supine): (All respiratory events with at least 50% flow reduction and without any oxygen desaturation threshold used) / hours of estimated sleep in non-supine position from type III home sleep apnea test
description:
Estimated sleep duration, providing an approximation of total sleep duration (i.e. total sleep time) inferred from analysis of non-EEG channels [Zhao et al., 2017 (PMID:27707441)]( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5181603/)

Details about how the respiratory events were scored can be found in the Embletta scoring manual.

Please refer to :ahi_screening: from the baseline screening visit for a more standardized version of AHI in this study.
